name: Rotato (MN games)
description:
Rotato is a simple game. in which you are travelling with a spaceship and bypassing obstacles in order to protect your vehicle from being destroyed. you can destroy some obstacles but not all of them. Let us see how much time can you survive.

Controls
  • Arrows/WASD to move.
  • Space to shoot.
Team
  • Producer: Mostafa Nady.
  • Programmer: Mostafa Nady.
  • Designer: Mostafa Nady.
  • Graphics: Kenney.nl 
  • VFX: Mostafa Nady.
  • Music : void1 gaming.
  • SFX: Kenney.nl
